column2:
"You've completed this latest boot camp.
There were no big problems as
far as I could tell."

"There is a major difference with when you were controlled by the weapon.
You've gotten good at handling it."

"But take care not to forget the basics. Anyone
can improve their skills through practice."

"But progressing beyond this point will require
even greater effort and special training. Until then..."

"問題なさそうね。
それでは今回の特訓はクリア。
完了としましょう。"

"武器に振り回されていた頃とは大違い。
上手く扱えているようね。"

"だけど、初心を忘れずに
研鑽を重ね続けていれば、誰でも
至る領域であるのもまた事実。"

"さらなる先へ至りたいのであれば
さらなる努力と特訓が必要よ。
それじゃあね。"
